item.title: Why is the world so quite when it snows? Snow is able to absorb sound because it is porous. Snowflakes are six-sided crystals, and they are filled with open spaces. item.title:
Crested mynas, as many other birds, are born altricially, which means young are underdeveloped at the time of birth, therefore fed by parents. When they grow up, they have to learn that food doesn't simply jump into their beaks
